contents.text: Thank you for calling Hiretual in South Bay, where AI accelerates your talent acquisition.
For sales and new customer inquiries, press 1.
To speak with a solutions consultant about sourcing candidates with AI, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a solutions consultant.

navigationGoals: I need to discuss how to integrate your AI sourcing tool into our recruiting process
As a veteran manager, I need to speak with a solutions consultant about using AI to source qualified candidates.
I need to connect with a solutions consultant to discuss AI-driven candidate sourcing capabilities.
I need help understanding how your AI finds qualified candidates for my small business
I’d like to speak with an expert about how your AI candidate sourcing works for a research project I’m conducting.

contents.text: To schedule a live demo of our AI sourcing platform, press 2.
Please hold while we schedule your demo.

navigationGoals: I’d like to book a live demo of your AI candidate sourcing platform
I’d like to schedule a live demo of your AI sourcing platform to evaluate it for my team’s hiring needs.
I’d like to schedule a live demo of your AI-powered talent sourcing platform.
I’d like to schedule a live demo of your AI sourcing platform
I want to schedule a live walkthrough of your AI sourcing platform to evaluate its functionality.

contents.text: For support and existing account assistance, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to a support specialist.

navigationGoals: I’m experiencing issues accessing my account and need technical support
I’m locked out of my dashboard and need technical support to regain access to my account.
I’m experiencing a technical issue with the AI candidate matching feature and need to talk to support.
I’m having trouble logging into my account and need technical help
I’m experiencing a technical issue with my account and need help troubleshooting the platform.

contents.text: For billing and account questions, press 2.
Please hold while we transfer you to our billing team.

navigationGoals: I have a question about my subscription invoice and billing details
I want to review my latest invoice and clarify a billing discrepancy on my account.
I have a question about my subscription billing and account charges.
I have a question about the charges on my latest invoice
I have questions about my subscription charges and need to discuss billing details.
